title: What is it like to do a PhD in EPFL? - Quora

response.answer_text: EPFL is highly ranked University in Europe.Shanghai ranking had declared it as a university just below Cambridge in Europe in 2011; since then it has not been an acclaimed http://institution.So you you have to take the decision with a pinch of salt. I personally found that the laurels to the university is brought by the students.Obviously , the quality of research & its newness is most important. If you are thinking about getting some leverage from EPFL’s reputation, you may note; EPFL is known for Engineering & Computer fields. If you are thinking of Ph D at EPFL in any one of these areas , go ahead.However, the nervous system of ‘platform ‘is Silicon Valley which controls the Web Economy across the world. I would suggest you to try for a Ph D in the USA.
